zetas-module-suite.zetas-dark-mode.title: Zeta's Drak Mode Settings
zetas-module-suite.zetas-dark-mode.name: Enable Dark Mode
zetas-module-suite.zetas-dark-mode.hint: Enable the dark mode from Zeta's Module Suite.
zetas-module-suite.zetas-smaller-chat.hi: Enable the smaller chat log cards.
zetas-module-suite.zetas-dir-changes.hin: Enable to make the right-hand sidetab more compact and modern.
zetas-module-suite.zetas-rolltype-button: Enable to display buttons instead of a dropdown for the rolltype selection.
